Pull Request: #203 - Refactor WebSocket reconnection logic
URL: https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/203
Status: open
Author: backend-dev

Description:
Improves the reconnection backoff algorithm and adds jitter to prevent thundering herd problem when many clients reconnect simultaneously.

Changes:
- Implemented exponential backoff with jitter for WS reconnection
- Added connection state machine to handle edge cases
- Improved heartbeat detection for stale connections
- Added metrics for reconnection attempts

Testing:
- Tested with network throttling in Chrome DevTools
- Simulated server restarts with 100 concurrent connections
